Pipeline releases¶

Below is a list of the pipeline releases that should be used at QBiC for the analysis. Unless a release has a bug that makes it impossible to work with your data, please use this fixed releases. These versions will be revised periodically and tested in our infrastructure before update.

Pipeline releases to be used at QBiC¶

Analysis type Pipeline Use version
RNAseq nf-core/rnaseq 1.4.2
RNAseq DE analysis qbic-pipelines/rnadeseq 1.3.2
WGS / WES nf-core/sarek 2.6.1
HLAtyping nf-core/hlatyping 1.2.0
16S amplicon nf-core/ampliseq 1.1.3
Shotgun metagenomics nf-core/mag 1.1.2
BCR / TCR repseq nf-core/bcellmagic 1.2.0
CAGEseq nf-core/cageseq 1.0.2
MHC immunopeptidomics nf-core/mhcquant 1.6.0
ATACseq nf-core/atacseq 1.2.1
Chipseq nf-core/chipseq 1.2.1
Epitope prediction nf-core/epitopeprediction 1.1.0
Bacterial assembly nf-core/bacass 1.1.1
RNA fusion nf-core/rnafusion 1.2.0
